㶸.en: (precise meaning unknown, relates to iron), variant of 協|协[xie2]

㻅.en: jade ornament in the seams of cap

㻽.en: variant of 璿|璇[xuan2], also pr. [sui4]

䈰.en: pot-scrubbing brush made of bamboo strips, basket (container) for chopsticks, variant of 筲[shao1]

䙓.en: hem at the bottom of garment

䜣.en: pleased, delighted, happy, variant of 欣

䫏.en: mask of a god used in ceremonies to exorcise demons and drive away pestilence, (archaic) ugly

䯝.en: variant of 髓, marrow, essence, quintessence, pith (soft interior of plant stem)

𠯠.en: to speak falsely or wrongly, ugly

𥫣.en: round basket used for feeding the cattle

𦈡.en: multicolored silk, piece of silk torn in two, used to verify the holder's identity by matching up the two halves

𨅬.en: to pass, to step over, to creep, to twine round

𨰿.en: (arch.) metal horn attached as shield to horse or to the axle of a chariot

𩠌.en: dish of food, usu. to be eaten with rice (Cantonese)

𪟝.en: variant of 績|绩[ji4], merit, accomplishment

𫍽.en: usually used in a name, clever, intelligent

𫔶.en: vertical divider of a door way

𫟷.en: livermorium (chemistry), (old) (Italian) lira (loanword), (archaic) type of food vessel used in Funan 扶南[Fu2 nan2]

𫫇.en: variant of 惡|恶[e3], esp. used in names of chemical components

𫷷.en: to arrange in ordered fashion, also pr. [qin1]

𫸩.en: nock at end of bow, stretch

𬀩.en: the bright shining of the sun

𬇕.en: variant of 漫[man4], overflow of water, spreading

𬉼.en: copious smoke produced by smoldering firewood, half alight, to use the smoke of burning wormwood etc to repel insects

𬩽.en: surname Xun, place name, Taiwan pr. [Xin2]

𬬮.en: sharp, a keen edge, sharp point

𬮤.en: side door, variant of 閣|阁[ge2], pavilion, cabinet, boudoir

𬯀.en: to go up, to fall, rainbow, mist

𬶍.en: catfish, a kind of small fish, Chinese alligator

𬶏.en: a kind of shad with a head like a sturgeon

𬶨.en: see 白鱀豚|白𬶨豚[bai2 ji4 tun2]
